DOC.brief_summary: Contextualization : Exercise common trigger bronchospasm patient asthma healthy subject . To prevent symptom frequently use Short-Acting Beta2-Agonists . However , cardiovascular effect salbutamol exercise remain poorly know . Objective : To evaluate effect salbutamol heart rate blood pressure exercise patient moderate severe asthma healthy individual . Methods : A randomized , double-blind , crossover study conduct 13 individual moderate severe persistent asthma 13 healthy individual age 20 59 year . Patients perform maximal effort test 2 nonconsecutive day , either 400mcg Salbutamol 4 placebo puff . The order use placebo salbutamol drawn . During protocol , heart rate , blood pressure , perception exertion peak expiratory flow monitor .
